00033 
00034     double  radius ;            
00035     Coordinate_t ringcenter ;   
00036     double  arcstrength ;       
00037     double  gain ;              
00038     double  mugain ;

00040     double  soal ;

00042     double  arclen ;            
00043     double  philo;              
00044     double  phihi;              
00045     double  phimid;

00047     int nplotpoints ;           
00048     double muonness;            
00049     double smoothness;          
00050     double smoothness_var;      
00051     double xcs;
00052     double ycs;
00053     double rspread;
00054 
00055     void clear() {
00056         
00057         radius = 0;
00058         ringcenter.x  = ringcenter.y = 0;
00059         arcstrength = 0;
00060         gain = 0;
00061         mugain = 0;
00062         ringfrac = 0;
00063         soal = 0;
00064         muskew = 0;
00065         arclen = 0;
00066         nplotpoints = 0;
00067         muonness =0;

00070         philo=0;
00071         phihi=0;
00072         phimid=0;

00143

00145         float   x0 ;
00146         float   y0 ;
00147         short     ix ;
00148         short   iy ;
00149         float   r ; 
00150     };

00161     typedef std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> > > Grid_3d_uint;

00163     typedef std::vector<std::vector<int> > Grid_2d_int ;
